doc.field: Rand School of Social Science Records
Rand School of Social Science Records
Series V: Rand School Bookstore Records
Series V: Rand School Bookstore Records

The Rand School Bookstore records, consisting of six subject files, include reports and plans of the bookstore, financial records, job applications, printed catalogues of books, advertising flyers and brochures, and correspondence. The items within these files are arranged' in chronological order., with undated items placed at the end of the file. Of particular interest in this series is the correspondence (XIII:E:6). The letters contained in this file offer a unique insight into the operating procedures of the bookstore and the people who transacted business with the store.
